ControlledList.ListName: Fire Incident Special Service Types List

Metadata.Creator: Fire and Rescue Statistics Division, HM Government
Metadata.Description: Fire and Rescue Statistics - Incident Collection System taxonomy file defining the Incident Special Service Types.
Metadata.Subject.Project: Fire and Rescue Statistics - Incident Collection System
Metadata.Title: Fire and Rescue Statistics - Incident Collection System taxonomy for the Incident Special Service Types

Item.Name: Special Service
Item.ScopeNotes: Base item for all special service types

Item.Name: Release of person/s
Item.ScopeNotes: Persons released from vehicle with assistance of FRS, but not extricated

Item.Name: Medical assistance only
Item.ScopeNotes: (e.g. First Aid)

Item.Name: Extrication of person/s
Item.ScopeNotes: Includes where a train hits a car on a level crossing; Inclusive of fatal victims.

Item.Name: Release of person/s
Item.ScopeNotes: Includes where a train hits a car on a level crossing

Item.Name: Make vehicle safe
Item.ScopeNotes: Includes where a train hits a car on a level crossing

Item.Name: Make scene safe
Item.ScopeNotes: Includes where a train hits a car on a level crossing

Item.Name: Medical assistance only
Item.ScopeNotes: (e.g. First Aid) Includes where a train hits a car on a level crossing

Item.Name: Advice only
Item.ScopeNotes: Includes where a train hits a car on a level crossing

Item.Name: Stand by - no action
Item.ScopeNotes: Includes where a train hits a car on a level crossing

Item.Name: Other
Item.ScopeNotes: Includes where a train hits a car on a level crossing

Item.Name: Person in water or at immediate risk of entering water
Person in river, canal, loch (open to the sea), sea or estuary or other waterway (moving water)
Item.BroaderItem: Person in water or at immediate risk of entering water

Item.Name: Person in pond, lake, loch (fully enclosed by land), or reservoir (still water)
Item.BroaderItem: Person in water or at immediate risk of entering water

Item.Name: Person fallen through ice or at risk of doing so
Item.BroaderItem: Person in water or at immediate risk of entering water

Item.Name: Person in indoor or outdoor pool
Item.BroaderItem: Person in water or at immediate risk of entering water

Item.Name: Person stranded on beach or cliff with rising or full tide, river side/ravine or other waterway embankment where could fall into waterway
Item.BroaderItem: Person in water or at immediate risk of entering water

Item.Name: Person in sinking or otherwise unsound vessel
Item.BroaderItem: Person in water or at immediate risk of entering water

Item.Name: Person in industrial or other manmade water feature, e.g. sewage plant, industrial effluent pool
Item.BroaderItem: Person in water or at immediate risk of entering water

Item.Name: Person in or on top of vehicle that is surrounded by moving or rising water greater than (2) foot deep
Item.BroaderItem: Person in water or at immediate risk of entering water

Item.Name: Person in or on top of building that is surrounded by moving or rising water that will exceed head height or cause structural collapse
Item.BroaderItem: Person in water or at immediate risk of entering water

Item.Name: Person assisted from mobile home (e.g. caravan) surrounded by moving or rising water greater than (2) foot deep
Item.BroaderItem: Person in water or at immediate risk of entering water

Item.Name: River structure; bridge or island, stranded on an island, tree in water.
Item.BroaderItem: Person in water or at immediate risk of entering water

Item.Name: Bank side, partly in or out of water.
Item.BroaderItem: Person in water or at immediate risk of entering water

Item.Name: From widespread flooding, e.g. flooded street or field.
Item.BroaderItem: Person in water or at immediate risk of entering water

Item.Name: Other
Item.BroaderItem: Person in water or at immediate risk of entering water

Item.Name: Person not in water or at imminent risk of entering water (NB water not flowing)
Person assisted from dwelling surrounded by water
Item.BroaderItem: Person not in water or at imminent risk of entering water (NB water not flowing)

Item.Name: Person assisted through or across public highway covered by water
Item.BroaderItem: Person not in water or at imminent risk of entering water (NB water not flowing)

Item.Name: Other
Item.BroaderItem: Person not in water or at imminent risk of entering water (NB water not flowing)

Item.Name: Trapped in or under machinery or other object, e.g. hopper, conveyor, crusher
Confined space with a noxious, toxic or oxygen deficient atmosphere
Confined space - atmosphere not noxious, e.g. silo, grains tore
From height e.g. pylon crane, roof or ledge
From below ground, e.g. shaft, cave, tunnel, sewer, well

Stabilise or otherwise make safe unsafe structure
Cordon off hole e.g. Hole in road, Hole in pedestrian area
Remove object / obstruction from pedestrian area
For child
Item.ScopeNotes: Details of persons required.

Item.Name: For medical case
Item.ScopeNotes: Details of persons required. 'For medical case' - should be used in circumstances where one or more of the occupants that are shut in a lift requires medical treatment or any unnecessary or prolonged incarceration within the confines of the lift will worsen an existing medical condition.

Item.Name: For person in distress
Item.ScopeNotes: Details of persons required. Please use judgement based on victim's emotional state at the time of the incident.

Item.Name: For able bodied person not in distress
Item.ScopeNotes: Details of persons NOT required.

Item.Name: No persons involved
Item.ScopeNotes: Details of persons NOT required.

Item.Name: For child
Item.ScopeNotes: Details of persons required.

Item.Name: For medical case
Item.ScopeNotes: Details of persons required.

Item.Name: For person in distress
Item.ScopeNotes: Details of persons required. Please use judgement based on victim's emotional state at the time of the incident.

Item.Name: For able bodied person not in distress
Item.ScopeNotes: Details of persons NOT required.

Item.Name: No persons involved
Item.ScopeNotes: Details of persons NOT required.

Item.Name: Other
Item.ScopeNotes: Includes disabled person not in distress.

Item.Name: Chest Pain / Cardiac Arrest / Heart condition
Chest Pain / Cardiac Arrest / Heart condition
Service not required
Item.ScopeNotes: Includes use for smoke cloak where the brigade is called, knowing there is no incident, but just to ventilate the premises.
